meanings.definition: A class of drugs used to treat osteoporosis.
meanings.sent1: Doctors prescribed etidronates to help strengthen bones.
meanings.sent2: Many patients take etidronates regularly to improve bone density.
meanings.sent3: The bottle of etidronates on the shelf seemed to whisper, 'Strong bones ahead!'
meanings.sent4: Her daily dose of etidronates was like a shield protecting her bones.
meanings.sent5: The image of brittle bones shattered as she swallowed the etidronates.

meanings.definition: The plural form of etidronate, a medication used to prevent bone loss.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacy stocked various etidronates for different patients.
meanings.sent2: Some studies have shown positive effects of etidronates on bone health.
meanings.sent3: The group of etidronates huddled together, ready to fight bone loss.
meanings.sent4: In her cabinet, bottles of etidronates stood like soldiers guarding her bones.
meanings.sent5: The power of multiple etidronates combined to create a fortress of bone protection.
